TEXT.S: Dwight Anderson nalecuh i Dayton Ohio ciniza, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Dwight Anderson i 1982 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ku uwac atu silsil 41, namapili' tu nu Washington Bullets putiput. 12 bulad 28 demiad, 1960 a mihca, Dwight Anderson, miunduay.
